snippet.title: Rumours are circulating Richie Strahan and Alex Nation have split after 10-months together
snippet.content:
The Bachelor Finale: Richie chooses Alex 0:30
In the finale, Richie makes his final decision, choosing Alex as the one he wants to share his heart and life with. CREDIT: Channel 10
September 15th 2016 a year ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Entertainment - syndicated/
There are rumours that Richie Strahan and Alex Nation have split.
Jonathon Moran and Kris Crane
Share
IT appears another Bachelor love affair may be over. Speculation is mounting Richie Strahan and Alex Nation have called time on their relationship, 10-and-a-half months after he When contacted by phone last night, a downcast Strahan danced around the issue and refused to shut down speculation that the couple had broken up. Nation too was silent, not responding to calls for comment. They're both represented by Chadwick Celebrity, the agency saying it would not comment on the couple's "personal lives" despite having signed them because of their national profile from the reality dating show.
Is this celebrity couple no more?Source:Supplied There has been radio silence online from the pair, who previously posted regular images together on social media. And they've not been seen together in public since the Logie Awards in April. Confidential understands the pair were due to travel to South East Asia together recently. Instead of going as a couple, they took separate holidays. While Matty Johnson is currently wooing women on the new season of The Bachelor, the show has had a mixed degree of success in previous seasons. The first Bachelor, from the show, Anna Heinrich, while
While the first Bachelor Tim Robards has finally got engaged to Anna Heinrich. Source: InstagramSource:Supplied
Snezana Markoski and Sam Wood will have the first Bachelor baby this year. Picture: Julie KiriacoudisSource:News Corp Australia Sam Frost wasn't so lucky, having first been dumped by Blake Garvey before her stint on The Bachelorette and subsequently splitting from Sasha Mielczarek.
